seo: Hashicorp Consul,远程命令执行漏洞,服务发现,配置工具
summary: 检测Hashicorp Consul Service API是否存在远程命令执行漏洞，通过发送特定HTTP请求验证EnableRemoteScriptChecks是否为true，并提供修复建议
summary_en: Detects whether the Hashicorp Consul Service API has a remote command execution vulnerability by sending specific HTTP requests to verify if EnableRemoteScriptChecks is true, and provides remediation suggestions
